channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WCFM Marketplace – Best Multivendor Marketplace for WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2021-24849|2024-08-03T19:42:17.219Z -- unknown -- wcfm%20marketplace%20%E2%80%93%20best%20multivendor%20marketplace%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The wcfm_ajax_controller AJAX action of the WCFM Marketplace WordPress plugin before 3.4.12, available to unauthenticated and authenticated user, does not properly sanitise multiple parameters before using them in SQL statements, leading to SQL injections
